mms.controller.admin

Class ManageCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • mms.controller.AbstractController
      • mms.controller.admin.ManageCustomerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAbstractController, IManageCustomerController

    public class ManageCustomerController
extends AbstractController
implements IManageCustomerController
    This class manage the editing of the data of an user.
    Author:
    Luca Pascucci, Filippo Nicolini, Alessandro Bagnoli
